response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute greatly to your success. This product holds immense value to me, but I am confident it will also bring substantial benefits to you, given its worth of $1,000,000 to you.

Considering its exceptional quality and the impact it could have on your business or personal projects, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $900,000. This offer represents a significant discount compared to its true value, providing you with an excellent opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a favorable cost.

Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. I am looking forward to the possibility of working together and contributing to your success through this remarkable product.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 900000}
